PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-08812014-07-22JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActCriminal Code
SubjectOrder Amending the Order Declaring an Amnesty Period (2014)
PrecisOrder Amending the ORDER DECLARING AN AMNESTY PERIOD (2014) in order to protect persons from criminal prosecution if they use an affected firearm for target shooting at approved ranges or transport them for that purpose while the Government is undertaking the necessary steps to allow affected persons to continue to possess, use and transport their firearms.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0182 Publication Date: 2014-08-13
AttachmentsAttachment
